languages.text: "Я {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}, Муаран, а не игрушка в руках холодной судьбы, которая, как ты твердишь, говорит твоими устами! Мой выбор Пути ничуть не хуже твоего или другого эльдара — и мой Путь требует сражаться с нашими истинными врагами, а не изничтожать мон-кай! Если придется — я встану на их сторону, ведь элантах способ{mf|ен|на} узреть то, что не дано тебе, провидец!" {n}Глаза Ирлиэт сверкают. Она выразительно кладет руку на оружие, не сводя взгляда с провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я дитя Асурьян, Муаран, а не игрушка в руках холодной судьбы, которая, как ты твердишь, говорит твоими устами! Мой выбор Пути ничуть не хуже твоего или другого эльдара — и мой Путь требует сражаться с нашими истинными врагами, а не изничтожать мон-кай! Если придется — я встану на их сторону, ведь эл'антар способ{mf|ен|на} узреть то, что не дано тебе, провидец!" {n}Глаза Ирлиэт сверкают. Она выразительно кладет руку на оружие, не сводя взгляда с провидца.{/n}

languages.text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Дитя Азуриана{/g}, Муаран, а не игрушка в руках холодной судьбы, которая, как ты твердишь, говорит твоими устами! Мой выбор Пути ничуть не хуже твоего или другого эльдара — и мой Путь требует сражаться с нашими истинными врагами, а не изничтожать мон-кай! Если придется — я встану на их сторону, ведь элантах способ{mf|ен|на} узреть то, что не дано тебе, провидец!" {n}Глаза Ирлиэт сверкают. Она выразительно кладет руку на оружие, не сводя взгляда с провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am a Child of Asuryan, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this el'antar can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the farseer.{/n}

My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

languages.text: “我是{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，穆兰。你声称你是命运的代言人，但我并不是冰冷的命运之手的玩物！我对道途的选择，并不逊色于你，或是其他的灵族。我的道途要求我与我们真正的敌人作战，并不是将猴子彻底铲除！如果事情真的闹到了不可开交的地步，我会与他们站在一起，因为这位外界人看到了你看不到的东西，先知！”{n}伊莉耶特的双眼中闪烁着愤怒的光芒。她有意将手搭在她的武器上，看着远处的先知。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，穆兰。你声称你是命运的代言人，但我并不是冰冷的命运之手的玩物！我对道途的选择，并不逊色于你，或是其他的灵族。我的道途要求我与我们真正的敌人作战，并不是将猴子彻底铲除！如果事情真的闹到了不可开交的地步，我会与他们站在一起，因为这位外界人看到了你看不到的东西，先知！”{n}伊莉耶特的双眼中闪烁着愤怒的光芒。她有意将手搭在她的武器上，看着远处的先知。{/n}

languages.text: 「我は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}だ。ムアラン、お前がその口で主張する運命とやらの、冷たき手にもてあそばれる存在ではない！我の選択はお前の道にも他のアエルダリの道にも決して劣らない。我の道とは、モン＝ケイを根絶やしにすることではない、真の敵と戦うことだ！最悪の事態になれば、我はモン＝ケイに協力しよう。なにしろ、このエランタはお前が盲目だと見抜いているのだからな、先見司！」{n}ユリエットの瞳は憤怒に燃えている。これ見よがしに武器に手をかけるが、先見司とは目を合わせない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}だ。ムアラン、お前がその口で主張する運命とやらの、冷たき手にもてあそばれる存在ではない！我の選択はお前の道にも他のアエルダリの道にも決して劣らない。我の道とは、モン＝ケイを根絶やしにすることではない、真の敵と戦うことだ！最悪の事態になれば、我はモン＝ケイに協力しよう。なにしろ、このエランタはお前が盲目だと見抜いているのだからな、先見司！」{n}ユリエットの瞳は憤怒に燃えている。これ見よがしに武器に手をかけるが、先見司とは目を合わせない。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bin ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, kein Spielzeug in den kalten Händen des Schicksals, das laut Eurer Aussage aus Eurem Munde spricht! Die Wahl meines Pfades ist nicht schlechter als Eure oder die irgendeines anderen Aeldari – und mein Pfad verlangt, unsere wahren Feinde zu bekämpfen, nicht die Chem-Pan-Sey auszulöschen! Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich an ihrer Seite stehen, denn dieser Elantach kann sehen, was Eurer Blindheit verborgen bleibt, Runenprophet!" {n}Yrliets Augen blitzen vor Wut. Sie legt demonstrativ die Hand auf ihre Waffe und wendet den Blick von dem Runenpropheten ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ein {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kind von Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, kein Spielzeug in den kalten Händen des Schicksals, das laut Eurer Aussage aus Eurem Munde spricht! Die Wahl meines Pfades ist nicht schlechter als Eure oder die irgendeines anderen Aeldari – und mein Pfad verlangt, unsere wahren Feinde zu bekämpfen, nicht die Chem-Pan-Sey auszulöschen! Wenn es dazu kommt, werde ich an ihrer Seite stehen, denn dieser Elantach kann sehen, was Eurer Blindheit verborgen bleibt, Runenprophet!" {n}Yrliets Augen blitzen vor Wut. Sie legt demonstrativ die Hand auf ihre Waffe und wendet den Blick von dem Runenpropheten ab.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, pas un jouet entre les mains insensibles du destin qui, à vos dires, parle à travers vous ! La Voie que j'ai choisie est aussi valable que la vôtre ou celle de tout autre Aeldari, et elle m'exhorte à combattre nos véritables ennemis au lieu d'exterminer les mon-keigh ! S'il faut en arriver là, je me battrai à leurs côtés, car {mf|cet|cette} elantach voit ce qui vous échappe, Grand Prophète ! » {n}Les yeux d'Yrliet flamboient de colère. Elle place ostensiblement sa main sur son arme et se détourne du Grand Prophète.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis une {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfant d'Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, pas un jouet entre les mains insensibles du destin qui, à vos dires, parle à travers vous ! La Voie que j'ai choisie est aussi valable que la vôtre ou celle de tout autre Aeldari, et elle m'exhorte à combattre nos véritables ennemis au lieu d'exterminer les mon-keigh ! S'il faut en arriver là, je me battrai à leurs côtés, car {mf|cet|cette} elantach voit ce qui vous échappe, Grand Prophète ! » {n}Les yeux d'Yrliet flamboient de colère. Elle place ostensiblement sa main sur son arme et se détourne du Grand Prophète.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Soy una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, no una muñeca en las frías manos del destino que aseguras que habla a través de ti! Mi elección de Senda no es inferior a la tuya ni a la de ningún otro Aeldari, ¡y me insta a combatir a nuestros verdaderos enemigos, no a erradicar a los mon-keigh! ¡De ser necesario, lucharé en su bando, pues est{mf|e|a} elantach puede ver lo que tú te niegas a reconocer, vidente!». {n}La furia brilla en los ojos de Yrliet. Coloca una mano elocuente sobre su arma y aparta la mirada del vidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Soy una {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hija de Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, no una muñeca en las frías manos del destino que aseguras que habla a través de ti! Mi elección de Senda no es inferior a la tuya ni a la de ningún otro Aeldari, ¡y me insta a combatir a nuestros verdaderos enemigos, no a erradicar a los mon-keigh! ¡De ser necesario, lucharé en su bando, pues est{mf|e|a} elantach puede ver lo que tú te niegas a reconocer, vidente!». {n}La furia brilla en los ojos de Yrliet. Coloca una mano elocuente sobre su arma y aparta la mirada del vidente.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'yum{/g} Muaran. Ağzından çıktığını iddia ettiğin kaderin duygusuz elinde oyuncak değilim! Kendi seçtiğim Yol, seninkinden veya başka herhangi bir Aeldari'ninkinden kötü değil. Yolum beni mon-keighlerin kökünü kazımaya değil, gerçek düşmanlarımızla savaşmaya çağırıyor! Eğer gerekirse mon-keighlerin yanında dimdik dururum zira bu elantach, senin göz ardı ettiklerini görebiliyor Ötesezen!" {n}Yrliet'in gözleri hiddetle parlıyor. Dediklerinin altını çizercesine elini silahına koyuyor ve başını Ötesezen'den çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Child of Asuryan{/g}, Muaran, not a plaything in the cold hands of fate, which you claim speaks through your mouth! My choice of Path is no worse than yours or any other Aeldari's — and my Path calls me to fight our true enemies, not eradicate the mon-keigh! If it comes to it, I will stand with them, for this elantach can see what you are blind to, Farseer!" {n}Yrliet's eyes are alight with fury. She pointedly lays her hand on her weapon, looking away from the Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ben de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}ndan biriyim Muaran. Ağzından çıktığını iddia ettiğin kaderin duygusuz elinde oyuncak değilim! Kendi seçtiğim Yol, seninkinden veya başka herhangi bir Aeldari'ninkinden kötü değil. Yolum beni mon-keighlerin kökünü kazımaya değil, gerçek düşmanlarımızla savaşmaya çağırıyor! Eğer gerekirse mon-keighlerin yanında dimdik dururum zira bu elantach, senin göz ardı ettiklerini görebiliyor Ötesezen!" {n}Yrliet'in gözleri hiddetle parlıyor. Dediklerinin altını çizercesine elini silahına koyuyor ve başını Ötesezen'den çeviriyor.{/n}
